main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported on June 12 and June 19, 1957, in Houston, Texas.
interesting points: One sighting involved a round object varying in color from light green to red; it appeared above the clouds and was seen visually for one minute., Another sighting described three stars in a row that looked like a basketball signal light; the object appeared to explode after two seconds., The objects were observed both visually and on radar., The sightings were part of the Project Blue Book investigation program., All sightings contained no confirmed photographs.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects varying in color
witness description: Reports from various Air Force personnel
